Token.Abstract: The AWSFirehoseRecorder is a high level client meant for storing put record requests on the user's device. This allows developers to retain requests when the device is offline. It can also increase performance and battery efficiency since the Wi-Fi or cell network does not need to be woken up as frequently.
Returns a shared instance of this service client using [AWSServiceManager defaultServiceManager].defaultServiceConfiguration. When defaultServiceConfiguration is not set, this method returns nil.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A shared instance of this service client.

Token.Abstract: Creates a service client with the given service configuration and registers it for the key.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A string to identify the service client.

Token.Abstract: Retrieves the service client associated with the key. You need to call + registerFirehoseWithConfiguration:forKey: before invoking this method.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A string to identify the service client.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An instance of the service client.

Token.Abstract: Removes the service client associated with the key and release it.

Parameter.Name: key
Parameter.Abstract: A string to identify the service client.
